title: Man-made problem? Human activity near rivers can worsen droughts and flooding, study says
description: New research shows that it's not just climate change causing droughts and floods. The way humans manage rivers also can play a major role.
content:
Across the United States, a changing climate is dramatically altering waterways, swelling the flow of some rivers and streams while shrinking others to a trickle.
